ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( ISBLANK(Charity__c), OR( ISPICKVAL(Retirement_Method__c, "Donated"), ISPICKVAL(Retirement_Method__c, "User Purchase") ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: If the Retirement Method is either "User Purchase" or "Donated", then you must specify the organization that the asset was donated to, or the charity that was provided a donation in order for a user to "purchase" the asset.
